If I could sneak into the kitchen and steal the recipe for the gluten free pasta and pizza, I would.  I am still sitting here in disbelief that we what we had was gluten free.  By far, the best gluten free pizza and pasta my girlfriend and I have ever consumed.  I wish I could be a student for a week with the chef and take the recipes home with me to San Francisco.  These guys would seriously make a fortune if they sold this pizza and pasta in San Francisco.  No weird texture - the perfect combo of crispy and chewy pizza crust and no weird aftertaste on the pasta or pizza.  The pasta was light and delicate just as it should be.  If you have a gluten sensitivity or allergy, this is a must try. If you don't, it still was awesome!  We had the pizza, pasta, salad and focaccia bread and it was all perfect.
